Package index

GeoTox S3 Object

Functions using a GeoTox object

GeoTox() plot(<GeoTox>)
GeoTox S3 object
calculate_response()
Calculate response
compute_sensitivity()
Compute response sensitivity to parameter variation.
plot_sensitivity()
Plot results of sensitivity analysis.
sensitivity_analysis()
Perform sensitivity analysis
set_boundaries()
Set GeoTox boundaries
set_hill_params()
Set Hill parameters for a GeoTox object.
simulate_population()
Simulate population data

Simulate

Functions that perform Monte Carlo simulation

sample_Css()
Sample from pre-generated C_ss data
simulate_age()
Simulate ages
simulate_exposure()
Simulate external exposure
simulate_inhalation_rate()
Simulate inhalation rates
simulate_obesity()
Simulate obesity status

Calculate Functions

Functions that calculate various metrics

calc_concentration_response()
Calculate the mixture response from one of three different approaches: IA, GCA, or Hazard Quotient
calc_independent_action()
Independent Action
calc_internal_dose()
Calculate internal chemical dose
calc_invitro_concentration()
Calculate in vitro concentration
resp_quantiles()
Get response quantiles

Plot

Plotting functions

plot_exposure()
Plot exposure data.
plot_hill()
Plot Hill equation fits.
plot_resp()
Plot response data

Auxiliary

Auxillary and helper functions

fit_hill()
Fit 2- or 3-parameter Hill model
hill_conc()
Hill model concentration
hill_val()
Hill model response
get_fixed_age()
Get C_ss Data for Fixed Age
get_fixed_css()
Get Fixed C_ss Data
get_fixed_obesity()
Get C_ss Data for Fixed Obesity Status
get_fixed_other()
Get median C_ss Values
get_fixed_params()
Get C_ss Data for Fixed C_ss Generation Parameters
